thread.title: FIFA 17 release ratings update - and Harry Kane will be delighted after finally landing stats boost
thread.title_full: FIFA 17 release ratings update - and Harry Kane will be delighted after finally landing stats boost

author: Aaron Flanagan
title: FIFA 17 release ratings update - and Harry Kane will be delighted after finally landing stats boost
text:
Share this video Watch Next 
In total, 23 big name stars from around England have been given a little increase to ensure that their on-field form is replicated on the game. 
Kane's Tottenham team-mate Christian Eriksen joins him with an 85 rating, while Dele Alli has also been increased to 82 and Danny Rose to 81. Christian Eriksen is also up to 85 (Photo: Stefan Wermuth/Reuters) Dele Alli increases to 82 (Photo: Reuters) Danny Rose is up to 81 (Photo: Julian Finney) 
There have been some tidy increases for some of the Premier League's other star performers this season too. 
Eden Hazard is up to 89, Alexis Sanchez to 88 and Sadio Mane has been bumped to 82. 
It is not just the Premier League that is getting a revamp. The Italian, Spanish, French, German and Rest of the World leagues will be reviewed over the next 10 days. 
Here is how the Premier League players will look with their new ratings... EA Sports FIFA 17 reveal 'Ratings Refresh' (Photo: EA SPORTS FIFA) poll loading Is this new rating a fair one for Harry Kane? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
